title.rendered: Gadgetronix TZ Celebrates Recognition at KARIBU-KILIFAIR 2024 and Announces Sponsorship Partnership for KILIFAIR 2025

content.rendered:
We are delighted to announce that Gadgetronix, in collaboration with Blink, has been honored with an Award of Appreciation at the prestigious KARIBU-KILIFAIR 2024, East Africa’s largest tourism fair. This accolade, presented by KILIFAIR Promotion Co. Ltd, recognizes our outstanding support, performance, and contributions to promoting the event. The fair, held from June 6-9, 2024, brought together key players from the tourism industry, and we were proud to be part of this significant celebration.

Furthermore, our recognition at KILIFAIR 2024 underscores our ongoing dedication to advancing the tourism sector through innovative technology and exceptional service. As a group of companies including Gadgetronix.net LTD, GadgetroniX IT Limited, Miracle Experience Balloon Safaris, The Tanzanite Experience, Zanzibar Submarine, Blink Internet, and Safari in Style, we have consistently collaborated and participated in KILIFAIR’s previous years. One of the key updates this year was our confirmation as a sponsor for KILIFAIR 2025.

Moreover, this partnership with KILIFAIR 2025, as a sponsor underscores our commitment to fostering growth, innovation, and unparalleled experiences within the East African tourism sector. KILIFAIR, renowned for connecting thousands of exhibitors, buyers, and stakeholders from across the globe, has long been an integral part of East Africa’s tourism development. This sponsorship allows us to showcase our technological advancements and solutions, which are increasingly pivotal to the tourism industry’s evolution.

At KILIFAIR 2025, Gadgetronix TZ, alongside our other brands, will showcase cutting-edge solutions designed to enhance guest experiences, streamline operations, and create new revenue opportunities for the tourism and hospitality sectors. This partnership with KILIFAIR not only highlights the importance of technology in transforming the tourism landscape but also reflects our commitment to fostering growth, innovation, and unparalleled experiences within the East African tourism industry.

KILIFAIR has long been a pillar of tourism development in the region, connecting thousands of exhibitors, buyers, and stakeholders from around the globe. As we look ahead to KILIFAIR 2025, we are excited to continue pushing the boundaries of technology and showcase our innovations that are shaping the future of tourism. Join us at KILIFAIR 2025 and discover how we, along with our group of companies, are leading the way in revolutionizing the tourism sector. Stay tuned for more updates as we prepare for an unforgettable event!
